content:
With an enviable location in the very epicenter of New York City’s artistic and cultural landscape, WestHouse is ideally situated for all manner of enriching discoveries. Well versed in the nuances of this dynamic city, our Concierge team is ready to curate an agenda to your exacting specifications, providing privileged insight and access to some of the most venerable landmarks and institutions. And after a day of explorations or meetings, return to your “house away from home” to relax and unwind in luxurious privacy.

To inspire your wanderlust, here we present a snapshot of New York’s famed neighborhoods, and an overview of the pampering services and amenities on offer every day.
